title: (x) 04 | the interior design show - Trade Gothic Light {Karl}
author: typotect

comments.content:
Edit: I should really start _reading_ posts before replying, you already ruled out News Gothic..   
   
You guys are right, it's Trade Gothic

Did you try [Trade Gothic?](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221638/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/trade-gothic/testdrive.html?s=interior%2Bdesign&p=48)   
   
[I think Karl's right: TG Light]

Trade Gothic Light?   
   
Ill try it out, Thanks!
